Reptiles have lower metabolic rates than mammals.  So, you'd expect the T. Rex's caloric needs to be far below that of a mammal of equivalent size.  There are enormous snakes that eat only a few times a year, so that gives you an idea of how much lower the caloric needs of reptiles are, since they don't have to burn energy maintaining a constant body temperature.

That is a good question.  Birds are warmblooded but dinosaurs are not thought to have been.  Based on their growth rates (I think that is based on bone cross-sections, like with trees) they were intermediate between cold and warm blooded animals - I vaguely remember reading that somewhere.  Also, just due to their size they would have retained heat.  Overly simplifying it based on a couple of Google searches of animal weight and how much lions eat, a T Rex would have to eat about 600-700 lbs a day were it a mammal.

Gravity, electromagnetism, etc, are all "theories" which means they are backed by evidence and data.

Theories become laws once the actual evidence and data make them fact.  Gravitation is NOT a theory.  Electromagnetism is NOT a theory. Those are laws based on the fact that all the evidence and data prove them to be.  On the other hand, evolution is still a theory because the necessary evidence and data to make the Theory of Evolution a law has yet to appear as evidence or data.  Literally no scientist anywhere has found any evidence or data to outright prove evolution as something more than a theory.  Learn the scientific method, son.  First step is observance.  Next step is forming a theory based on that observation. Than you test the theory.  If you prove the theory as true, it becomes law. If you fail to prove that theory as true, it remains just that, a theory, until someone comes along to either prove or disprove the theory.  This is how science has worked for millennia and will remain how science actually works today.  Your TOTALLY warped view of science is how idiots today who actually deny scientific facts and findings have destroyed what science actually is.  Instead of telling others they need to educate themselves, do us all a favor and educate yourself about PROPER science and PROPER scientific study.

So it’s not just “made up”, theories can be tested and demonstrated using the scientific method.

You really don't know about science do you? Nothing in science is ever considered absolutely proven.

scientific fact - an observation that has been confirmed repeatedly and is accepted as true (although its truth is never final)

scientific theory - a coherent group of propositions formulated to explain a group of facts or phenomena in the natural world and repeatedly confirmed through experiment or observation.
